item.title: Setting up WSL2 with R and Visual Studio Code
item.description: This is mostly to document the resources I used to set up the Windows Subsystem for Linux 2 (WSL/2) for a local installation of R on Linux as well as setting up allowing Visual Studio Code (vscode) to remote into a machine with R installed and get nice features such as linting and intellisense. Setting up WSL2 and Windows Terminal WSL2 How I did this will probably be outdated so Iâ€™ll link to the docs instead:
